subject: Lacrosse
Hazing
College Athletics
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: In April, the coach of Franklin & Marshall, a private college in Lancaster, Pa., and a perennial Division III power, was fired and the team’s juniors and all but one of its seniors were suspended.
snippet: In April, the coach of Franklin & Marshall, a private college in Lancaster, Pa., and a perennial Division III power, was fired and the team’s juniors and all but one of its seniors were suspended.
